# Stunning Breath, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Your breath weapon

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 211

This spell functions like *[[Stunning Breath (Spell)|stunning breath]]*, except that creatures that fail their Fortitude saves are [[Stunned|stunned]] for 2d4 rounds.
